question: Are diet pills haram? even if you are overweight or obese?
answer:
QUESTION

Are diet pills haram? even if you are overweight or obese?

ANSWER


Share:

 

In the name of Allāh, Most Gracious, Most Merciful


Assalāmu ῾alaykum wa Rahmatullāhi Wabarakātuh

 

If the ingredients of the diet pills are halaal, then only will it be permissible to take the diet pills. 




And Allāh Ta῾āla Knows Best

Wassalāmu ῾alaykum
